wait im just starting it with Skidrow version, that version has DLC included? i saw the pirate costume in my inventory but i cant equip it yet (says i have to become a pirate) and how do i acces the other 2 dlc, the treasure island and the temple of air?

@Iniscor

all the DLC have been enabled in Skidrow version, however its missing its audio files. You can access other dlcs by going to their relevant island later in the game, I just finished Temple of Air.
